subject: running junit test case packaged in a jar
msgSnippet: I want to execute all my junit test cases which are packaged in a jar file. Is that possible to run this jar from command prompt by some command like java
messageBody:
I want to execute all my junit test cases which are packaged in a jar file. Is that possible to run this jar from command prompt by some command like

java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore -jar allTests.jar

What is the correct way to execute this?

If it is possible to execute then would i need some changes in manifest file for specifying the test class (like main class in java)

Thanks in advance.
